channels.summary: Discussion about AI-generated content influencing human communication patterns, plus moderation nudges about self-promotion and engagement, and a brief model/version reference.

highlights.title: AI-generated content creating feedback loops in human speech patterns
highlights.details: Madison discusses how pervasive AI-generated media leads people to recognize recurring AI speech patterns and image artifacts, raising the concern that even non-AI creators may subconsciously mimic these patterns, creating a feedback loop between AI content and human expression.
